page.title: 17Greek Dancing _ Test Area
page.content: A 15 year old Redbridge Comprehensive student has a place in the finals of the National competition for Greek Dancing in London. She was absent from school for two months before the competition with Glandular Fever. She has been dancing since she was 3 years old. Earlier this year she was third in a dance festival at Southmapton Guildhall. {Tanners Brook Allotments}: By Tanners rook School there are the Oakley Road allotments. They are between the houses of King Georges Avenue & the busy urban motorway of Tebourba Way. In July 1985, 146 of them are in use. To rent an allotment a person must live either within the city or up to a mile outside the boundary. The rent is Â£1.01 per rod each year. There are reductions for OAPs, registered disabled and the unemployed.
